Uses of Class
javax.time.OffsetDateTime

  • Packages that use OffsetDateTime 
    Package Description
    javax.time
    The main API for dates, times, instants, and durations.

    • Uses of OffsetDateTime in javax.time

      Fields in javax.time with type parameters of type OffsetDateTime 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Comparator<OffsetDateTime> OffsetDateTime.INSTANT_COMPARATOR
      Comparator for two OffsetDateTime instances based solely on the instant.

      Checks if the instant of this date-time is before that of the specified date-time.
